This method adds a continent to the continent model

This method handles deleting adjacent territories

This is a method to fill in surrounding enemy in the ListView
adjacentHandler() - Method in class com.risk.controller.FortificationController
This method handles showing the army count of the adjacent country the player chooses
Aggressive - Class in com.risk.model.strategy
 
Aggressive() - Constructor for class com.risk.model.strategy.Aggressive
 
AllOut() - Method in class com.risk.controller.AttackController
This method is used to roll dice automatically after the player chooses the attacker and defender It will stop when either the attacker has not enough army or the defender is conquered
assignBehaviour() - Method in class com.risk.controller.MapEditorController
This method assigns behaviour to players
assignCountriesToPlayers() - Method in class com.risk.controller.MapEditorController
This method assigns countries to players
assignMap() - Method in class com.risk.controller.TournamentModeController
this method is necessary to select type of map
assignPlayer() - Method in class com.risk.controller.TournamentModeController
this method is necessary to assign different behaviors for a tournament
attack(Country, Country, int) - Method in class com.risk.model.player.Player
This method is used to decrease the army amount or change the owner of country when it is occupied In case1, the defender lost in dice so it lost 1 army In case2, the attacker conquered the defender, so the owner of defender changes In case3, the attacker lost in dice so it lost 1 army
attack(Player) - Method in class com.risk.model.strategy.Aggressive
This method is used to do the attack for aggressive player The aggressive player uses his strongest country to do the attack until it has no enough armies
attack(Player) - Method in class com.risk.model.strategy.Benevolent
This method is used to do the attack for benevolent player The benevolent player doesn't do the attack
attack(Player) - Method in class com.risk.model.strategy.Cheater
This method is used to do the attack for cheater player The cheater player occupies all his neighbor enemies and put one army to each new occupied country
attack(Player) - Method in class com.risk.model.strategy.Random
This method is used to do the attack for cheater player The cheater player occupies all his neighbor enemies and put one army to each new occupied country
attack(Player) - Method in interface com.risk.model.strategy.Strategy

This is the constructor for AttackController classs
attackStrategy(Player) - Method in class com.risk.model.player.Player
This method is used to invoke attack strategy according to the type of computer player
autoAssignCountriesToPlayers() - Method in class com.risk.controller.MapEditorController
This method random assigns armies to setup stage
